mapper.insert: insert into class_tb values (default, #{userId}, #{classSubjectId}, DATE_FORMAT(#{classTime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H'), #{classMaxCustomer}, #{classCustomerReserve}, now(), now())
mapper.select: SELECT c.user_id, s.class_subject_name, c.class_time, c.class_max_customer, c.class_customer_reserve, u.nickname, u.ph, u.gender FROM class_tb c LEFT JOIN user_tb u ON c.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN class_subject_tb s ON c.class_subject_id = s.class_subject_id

SELECT c.user_id, s.class_subject_name, c.class_time, c.class_max_customer, c.class_customer_reserve, u.nickname, u.ph, u.gender FROM class_tb c LEFT JOIN user_tb u ON c.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN class_subject_tb s ON c.class_subject_id = s.class_subject_id WHERE s.class_subject_name = #{subjectName}

SELECT c.user_id, s.class_subject_name, c.class_time, c.class_max_customer, c.class_customer_reserve, u.nickname, u.ph, u.gender FROM class_tb c LEFT JOIN user_tb u ON c.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN class_subject_tb s ON c.class_subject_id = s.class_subject_id WHERE u.nickname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{nickname}, '%')
